name: Swordmageddon
description:
Swordmageddon is a game where you throw swords at planet earth?! (kinda of like darts) cept different

Originally supposed to be a short minigame but evolved to a much more

..so grab a drink relax wind down and shoot some swords

and enjoy 8 Levels of mind-numbing fun!

Tips : if your bad at aiming and timing you can use the BulkSword

-Monitor your gold / Try to save when you can

-Always use skills especially heal when ready

-Use other swords embedded in the earth as a landmark to get the timing right

-Use stronger swords if you want to focus on enemies with alot of hp

Please please please leave a comment or feedback as it helps me learn about things, even if the game sucks please tell me also comment if you happen to upload a video on youtube playing the game!

Thanks

07/06/22 - fixed bug with earth exploding after game is reset
